About Me Projects

My Expertise

In this section I've listed as far as my skills go as well as knowledge I have gained during my academic studies and previous jobs from simple but crucial Design to tools for my job that I use on the daily basis.

Design

I know how to control the content of a web application using html5 markup language and pimping up with CSS using bootstrap framework to enhance the design of the site

Code

My current job as a junior developer gave me the invaluable opportunity to learn a large amount of logic programming languages in both back-end and front-end. I am comfortable writing in nodejs using an intuitive and powerful framework called hapi for serving resources and integrating with external APIs that our in-house CMS Software required for the business.

Tools

I am fan #1 of Git for the reason that it is a great tool to help enable and improve collaboration with your peers. It is a version control system that tracks changes to files in projects. Records what the changes were like what was added? and what was removed from the file?, who made the change, notes and comments about the change and at what time the change was made.
